thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: Steve Brown
thread.title_full: Lube Mobile reviewed by Steve Brown

author: Steve Brown
title: Steve Brown
text:
Ben from Adelaide has been outstanding! His commitment to customer service is and has been fantastic, he serviced our Mercedes Viano, no problem, our Toyota Commuters, Checked our BCI 34 seat coach, and fixed our ford transits radiator and ignition packs, is there nothing he can't do? He is our "personal technician" cannot recommend highly enough.
Regards Steve Brown (Owner of Getaways SA)
